Westfield Newmarket security guard stabbing: Police Minister Mark Mitchell visits injured man in hospital https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/westfield-newmarket-security-guard-stabbing-police-minister-mark-mitchell-visits-injured-man-in-hospital/QSMBDZI3SNDT5GU5H23PYBLXSE/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/westfield-newmarket-security-guard-stabbing-police-minister-mark-mitchell-visits-injured-man-in-hospital/QSMBDZI3SNDT5GU5H23PYBLXSE/ Cherie Howie“We shudder to think what could’ve happened if knife-wielding offender wasn’t stopped." Sat, 23 Nov 2024 01:40:59 +0000 Security guard Lopeti is pictured with visitors to his hospital bedside this morning, including Police Minister Mark Mitchell, left, Newmarket Business Association chief executive Mark Knoff-Thomas, second from right, and fellow Newmarket Security staff. Lopeti was critically injured when he was stabbed in the neck while working outside Westfield Newmarket mall in Auckland on Thursday. Photo / LinkedIn
Wellsford Superette worker awarded $13k after ERA case hears of gruelling hours, no pay https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellsford-superette-worker-awarded-13k-after-era-case-hears-of-gruelling-hours-no-pay/S4NOW2BFHVESJAPUNXR4AMKA5Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/wellsford-superette-worker-awarded-13k-after-era-case-hears-of-gruelling-hours-no-pay/S4NOW2BFHVESJAPUNXR4AMKA5Q/ Shannon PitmanThe worker logged 437 hours in five weeks - all of which was unpaid. Fri, 22 Nov 2024 23:00:00 +0000 The owner of the Wellsford Superette has been ordered to pay a former worker more than $13,000.
We have $8.5 million in property and assets, do we have enough to retire? – Mary Holm https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/how-do-i-know-how-much-i-need-to-retire-mary-holm/SZQC54ASCRE2HG6TZVQ2GIJNCM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/business/how-do-i-know-how-much-i-need-to-retire-mary-holm/SZQC54ASCRE2HG6TZVQ2GIJNCM/ Mary HolmOPINION: There are simple guidelines that indicate what income you can pay yourself.
